name: Introduction to Journalism
description: This course introduces students to the fundamentals of journalism, including writing, reporting, and interviewing.

name: Data Journalism
description: This course teaches students the basics of data journalism, from data collection and analysis to writing data-driven stories.

name: Advanced Data Journalism
description: This course builds on the fundamentals of data journalism and teaches students more advanced methods for data collection, analysis, and reporting.

name: Data Visualization and Storytelling
description: This course focuses on the use of data visualization tools to tell stories with data. Students will learn how to create effective data visualizations and tell compelling stories with data.
